trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Bowling Green
There were no other sightings in Bowling Green on or around January 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting Detailssighting on Jan. 2, 2011 at approx. 5:57 AM CST. Object appeared as star like, 4Th or 5Th magnitude. First appeared to the East at approximately 30 degrees elevation, moving to the SSE. Disappeared 5-6 seconds later at approximately 20 degrees elevation. Very fast moving! Much faster than a satellite or aircraft, but not as fast as a meteor (didn't look like a meteor at all). No course deviations, no navigation or anti-collision lights, and no sound. Sighting entered in to CMS by KY.ASD Due to the fact that this report was email directly to me today.
Summary: Object appeared as star like, 4Th or 5Th magnitude. First appeared to the East at approximately 30 degrees elevation, moving to the SSE.
